A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow... completely agree with the audience reviews... this was a complete and utter disappointment. The fundamental flaw of the movie is that from Force Awakens to Last Jedi... there is not a consistent story. It’s like reading a a trilogy that is written by strangers that only very rarely talk about the story and characters. And when I say rarely\, I mean once in the whole time the trilogy was written. As far as the visuals\, most are brilliantly done\, expect the throne room... wow that fight sucked\, felt very slow compared to phantom menace.
